Uses of Class
camzup.core.Random

Packages that use Random 
Package Description
camzup.core  

  • Uses of Random in camzup.core

    Methods in camzup.core with parameters of type Random 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static Complex Complex.random​(Random rng, float rMin, float rMax, Complex target)
    Creates a complex number with an absolute of 1.0.
    static Curve2 Curve2.random​(Random rng, int count, float lowerBound, float upperBound, boolean closedLoop, Curve2 target)
    Creates a random curve.
    static Curve2 Curve2.random​(Random rng, int count, Vec2 lowerBound, Vec2 upperBound, boolean closedLoop, Curve2 target)
    Creates a random curve.
    static Curve3 Curve3.random​(Random rng, int count, float lowerBound, float upperBound, boolean closedLoop, Curve3 target)
    Creates a random curve.
    static Curve3 Curve3.random​(Random rng, int count, Vec3 lowerBound, Vec3 upperBound, boolean closedLoop, Curve3 target)
    Creates a random curve.
    static Quaternion Quaternion.random​(Random rng, Quaternion target)
    Creates a random unit quaternion.
    static Vec2 Vec2.random​(Random rng, Vec2 target)
    Generates a vector with a random heading and a magnitude of 1.0, such that it lies on the unit circle.
    static Vec3 Vec3.random​(Random rng, Vec3 target)
    Creates a vector with a magnitude of 1.0 at a random azimuth and inclination, such that it lies on the unit sphere.
    static Vec2 Vec2.randomCartesian​(Random rng, float lowerBound, float upperBound, Vec2 target)
    Creates a random point in the Cartesian coordinate system given a lower and an upper bound.
    static Vec2 Vec2.randomCartesian​(Random rng, Vec2 lowerBound, Vec2 upperBound, Vec2 target)
    Creates a random point in the Cartesian coordinate system given a lower and an upper bound.
    static Vec3 Vec3.randomCartesian​(Random rng, float lowerBound, float upperBound, Vec3 target)
    Creates a random point in the Cartesian coordinate system given a lower and an upper bound.
    static Vec3 Vec3.randomCartesian​(Random rng, Vec3 lowerBound, Vec3 upperBound, Vec3 target)
    Creates a random point in the Cartesian coordinate system given a lower and an upper bound.
    static Vec4 Vec4.randomCartesian​(Random rng, Vec4 lowerBound, Vec4 upperBound, Vec4 target)
    Creates a random point in the Cartesian coordinate system given a lower and an upper bound.
    static Color Color.randomHsb​(Random rng, Color target, Vec4 hsba)
    Creates a random HSBA vector, then converts it to an RGBA color.
    static Color Color.randomHsb​(Random rng, Vec4 lowerBound, Vec4 upperBound, Color target, Vec4 hsba)
    Creates a random HSBA vector from a lower- and upper-bound, then converts it to an RGBA color.
    static Color Color.randomHsba​(Random rng, Color target, Vec4 hsba)
    Creates a random HSBA vector, then converts it to an RGBA color.
    static Color Color.randomHsba​(Random rng, Vec4 lowerBound, Vec4 upperBound, Color target, Vec4 hsba)
    Creates a random HSBA vector from a lower- and upper-bound, then converts it to an RGBA color.
    static Vec2 Vec2.randomPolar​(Random rng, float rhoMin, float rhoMax, Vec2 target)
    Creates a vector at a random heading and radius.
    static Vec2 Vec2.randomPolar​(Random rng, Vec2 target)
    Creates a vector with a magnitude of 1.0 at a random heading, such that it lies on the unit circle.
    static Color Color.randomRgb​(Random rng, Color target)
    Creates a random color from red, green and blue channels.
    static Color Color.randomRgb​(Random rng, Color lowerBound, Color upperBound, Color target)
    Creates a random color from a lower- and upper-bound.
    static Color Color.randomRgba​(Random rng, Color target)
    Creates a random color from red, green, blue and alpha channels.
    static Color Color.randomRgba​(Random rng, Color lowerBound, Color upperBound, Color target)
    Creates a random color from a lower- and upper-bound.
    static Vec3 Vec3.randomSpherical​(Random rng, float rhoMin, float rhoMax, Vec3 target)
    Creates a vector at a random azimuth, inclination and radius.
    static Vec3 Vec3.randomSpherical​(Random rng, Vec3 target)
    Creates a vector with a magnitude of 1.0 at a random azimuth and inclination, such that it lies on the unit sphere.
    static Vec4 Vec4.randomSpherical​(Random rng, float rhoMin, float rhoMax, Vec4 target)
    Generates a random coordinate on a sphere.
